backend/main.mo: Main canister defining user profiles, balances, BTC transfer requests, authorization checks, and wallet/transaction management with access‑controlled query and update methods.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module returning unchanged persistent actor state with fields for network fee and request counter.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a frontend transfer‑details enhancement to specific source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing multiple frontend files including layout, hooks, pages, and transfer‑related components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base layers defining light/dark theme color variables and applying layout‑wide background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React routing and auth‑gating logic with admin verification flow, profile setup, and initial admin credit assignment.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: UI screen showing admin‑access denial with principal display, diagnostics, copy and retry actions, and navigation controls.
Loading screen for admin verification showing masked principal, elapsed time, and retry/sign‑out actions after delay.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminTroubl: Shows a warning card for authenticated non-admin users with their principal ID and a retry admin check button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides sign-in/out using Internet Identity and clears cached admin state on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their name to complete profile setup.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the app header with navigation, profile info, login button, and conditional admin link.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main layout with header, admin troubleshooting card, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Transf: Displays a table of transactions with type badges, timestamps, amounts, and a verify dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Verify: Dialog for verifying or confirming on-chain BTC transfers, showing status and allowing TXID input or copy.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on the user's identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data, wallet info, balances, admin status, and Bitcoin operations via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes along with reusable UI component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Renders an admin credentials overview showing principal, balance, and admin capabilities with navigation to the admin panel.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Provides the admin panel UI for managing credits, sending BTC, viewing transactions, and validating principals.
frontend/src/pages/BuyCreditsPage.tsx: Implements a UI for purchasing credit by submitting a Bitcoin transaction ID and amount, displaying balance and purchase status.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard UI showing balance, recent transactions, wallet info, and quick actions using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays full transaction history with credit/debit summaries and a detailed table.
frontend/src/pages/SendBtcPage.tsx: Form for sending BTC with balance display, fee estimation, validation, and transfer submission handling.
frontend/src/utils/adminStatusCache.ts: Manages per-principal admin status caching with TTL using localStorage and in-memory tracking.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes backend Send BTC error messages into user-friendly text with special handling for broadcast issues.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters across navigation using URL and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins for styling.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app purpose, architecture notes, known issues, and a list of implemented features with versioned IDs.
